Despite the fact that it is a single-case observation, the evolution of the patient seems to corroborate the proposal of Hussain et al. that anemia, hemolysis and chronic inflammation, physiopathological characteristics of SCD, might have a favorable influence in the clinical course of COVID-19 infection in these patients.
